high_descs: Walk towards the bed and then turn right to stand in front of the bedside table.
Pick up the pencil from the table.
Turn left and walk towards the lamp on the desk to your right.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Go to the bed, turn to the night stand
Grab the pencil by the phone
Turn left, walk to the table with a lamp
anns.task_desc: Grab the pencil on the night stand, turn on the lamp on the table

high_descs: Move toward the bed and turn left to face the night stand.
Pick up the pencil in front of the credit card.
Turn around, turn right move toward the wall and turn right.
Turn on the lamp on the left side of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick the pencil from the night stand and turn on the desk lamp on the left side of the desk.

high_descs: Cross the room and hang a left at the bed to reach a small brown desk.
Pick up the pencil to the right of the cell phone on top of the desk.
Turn around, take a right at the middle of the bed, cross the room towards the wall, hang a right to reach the large brown desk.
Turn on the small lamp in the back left corner on top of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a pencil near the light of a small lamp.
